description:
Out of the blue, Cranberry challenges La Pucelle to a duel. Confused, she takes the challenge. Three days later, Fav announces the third dropout, as well as the addition of new items. Magicaloid 44 asks Calamity Mary to join forces with her. She agrees, but on a condition: “Kill someone.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geki Rare Item o Get Shiyou!
激レアアイテムをゲットしよう!
